song.title: Holy Spirit, Come And Enflame Our Hearts
song.lyrics:
[C] Holy Spirit come and enflame our hearts, Holy Spirit come! Holy Spirit come and renew the face of earth!
[V1] Holy Spirit, fill our lives, Holy Spirit, set us on fire. Lead us on the path of life Holy Spirit, purify our hearts.
[V2] Holy Spirit, mould us anew, Lord of life, come strengthen our souls. Love of Christ, enlighten our minds Give us joy that never ends.
